data.message: Dear Eminem - I just wondered why you had to use the word retarded in your new song with Beyonce? After your awesome anti-Trump rant/rap I was disheartened to hear you diss people with intellectual disabilities just like DJT did during the campaign. I am hopeful you would offer an apology and make an effort hang out with children who are mentally delayed for a few hours to see how wonderful they are. Sincerely- Sarah, the mom to an awesome 10 year old with Down syndrome who doesn't deserve for society to mock him

replies.message: where were you when he talked shit about the rest of the world. come on.
Chase Rennie so I can't have a cause? Is the rest of the world as vulnerable as people who are mentally delayed?
Sarah Tacoma I think, by "retarded" he just meant "stupid"... I doubt he intentionally meant to hurt those with mental disabilities
